mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pub_dictionary WHERE type=#{type} and value=#{value}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 AND type=#{type} and value=#{value}

SELECT pub_cityaddr.id as id, pub_cityaddr.city as city FROM pub_dictionary, pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 AND pub_cityaddr.`status` = 1 AND pub_dictionary.text=pub_cityaddr.id AND type=#{type} and value=#{value}

SELECT pub_cityaddr.id AS id,pub_cityaddr.city AS city FROM pub_vehicle_scope, pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_vehicle_scope.`Status`=1 AND pub_cityaddr.`status`=1 AND pub_vehicle_scope.cityid=pub_cityaddr.id AND pub_vehicle_scope.vehicleid = #{id}
